title: Siting Solar
subtitle: This mapping tool reflects currently available data geographic eligibility for the Inflation Reduction Act Low-Income Communities Bonus Credit Program.
description: This map includes the following categories: Energy Community Tax Credit Eligibility Low-Income Community (New Markets Tax Credit) Eligibility Native American Reservation and Protected Land Energy Burdened and Low-Income Designated Census Tracts Polluted Community Designated Census Tracts (PM2.5 Exposure Level) Persistent Poverty Counties.

orgs.name: Resonant Energy
orgs.description: a Boston-based solar provider with a mission to build wealth in Environmental Justice communities through solar power
